thread.title: Elisse Smith
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Elisse Smith

author: Elisse Smith
title: Elisse Smith
text: Gardner white is my go to for all my furniture needs. Their selection is vast, customer service above and beyond, and overall experience quick and simple. Will continue my love of furniture shopping at Gardner white for many years to come!
